news.content:
The ThreeFold Foundation’s primary goal is to achieve sustainable and organic growth of the ThreeFold Grid.

Here’s part one (of two) of our TF Grid Utilization Plan, which focuses primarily on TF Grid Solutions.

As always, we’d love to have your feedback. And you can look forward to part two, which will cover some of our key partnerships.
news.excerpt: Part one (of two) of our ThreeFold Grid utilization plan, focusing on TF Grid solutions.

previous.title: Happy Holidays!
previous.excerpt: Let’s take a moment to acknowledge what a year it’s been for all of us around the world.
